page.title: 04 JOHN
page.content: John is five years old and lives with his parents in a farm cottage in Rodhuish. 'Aunty' Jill lives next door. From his bedroom he can see the sea, lots of fields and the other four houses nearby. There are no other children in the village so John spends his evenings and weekends playing with Kim, his 3 year old sister. John also looks after his many pets including a field mouse that he found recently on a walk with his Dad. He walks a lot but never alone as Dad thinks that the hills and farms are too dangerous. Every Saturday the family go to Minehead to do the weeks shopping in the supermarket. Every weekday John catches the bus to travel the 3 miles to Washford and school. There he plays with his friends.
